name: Zombie Nightmare (itch) (DomTheDev)
description:
Zombie Nightmare is a First Person Zombie Wave Shooter where YOU can decide how the difficulty progresses. 

The game is heavily inspired by the Call of Duty zombies game mode, with an added twist! Every two rounds, the player can pick which aspect of the game gets more difficult.

 Survive for as many rounds as possible!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • E - Interact
  • Escape - Pause/Back

This project was created as part of a University Assignment, with development starting in October 2022 and ending in December 2022.

All feedback is greatly appreciated!
